articles.author: Cristina Gallardo, Eleni Courea
articles.title: UK calls out Russia in show of post-Brexit strength - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: London embraces active deterrence against Moscow, deepening its security differences with the EU.
articles.content:
LONDON With troops gathering on the Russian-Ukraine border, Britain senses an opportunity to demonstrate it can be more diplomatically nimble since Brexit.
After leaving the EU, the U.K. has deploye… [+7500 chars]
